'''Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon''' is an item the rewards the player with 30 Days of [[Blessing of the Welkin Moon]] rewards.

==How to Obtain==
Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon can only be obtained from limited time [[Web Events]]. The following events have had a chance to reward it:
* [[Discord Server Giveaway Event]]
* [[2020 Winter Art Contest]]
* [[A Message in Time]]
* [[Gifts of Encounter/2022-09-28]]
